page.title: 10MINISTER'S DIARY PART 2.
page.content: JUNE,1985 WEDNESDAY: Morning: Written work at Church. Afternoon: Attend Diocesan Synod in Belfast. Evening: Woodburn Youth Club Committee meeting. THURSDAY: 9.35 a.m. Carrickfergus High School inspection. Afternoon: Parish visiting. 7.00, 7.30 Wedding rehearsals. 8.00 p.m. Carrickfergus High School Management Committee. FRIDAY: 9.00 a.m Assembly in Woodlawn P.S. 1.05 p.m. Take Healing Service in Belfast Cathedral. Afternoon: Prepare for Sunday Service. There were 55 Baptisms, 29 Marriages, 36 Burials and 1 Cremation during 1984 for a Parish of 1300 families.
